channel.title: Adding Items Error
channel.description:
Hey guys, I just recently added Spirit sheilds to my server, So im trying to fix the stats, and make them go to the sheild slot. I added the sheilds to Items.cfg and this is the error i got
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/28qrgqu.jpg[/img]
Next I went to Items.Java and added it to the correct area under sheilds, and still nothing...
Im not Sure what to do at this point.
Please Help :)
-Owner Will
